question: The United Nations along with which country is to co-host a climate summit on 12th December 2020?
explanation:
The United Nations and Britain will co-host a global climate summit on 12th December 2020, which marks the fifth anniversary of the landmark Paris Agreement of UNFCC.
This summit is expected to create a momentum for the forthcoming United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP 26) to be held in November 2021 at Glasgow.
